We would have loved to have upgraded you, but there were no beach front or beach view rooms available to do so. The vacancy sign remained on because we had court view rooms available. We hope to have a second chance to provide you with a relaxing stay on your next visit to our area.  Kindest regards, Maredith Rizzo Public Relations Manager

title: Spent ten days at the sandpiper gulf
review: We really enjoyed our week at Sandpiper.  The beach was not busy and we found so many interesting creatures in the water including hermit crabs and live sand dollars.  The family pool area was wonderful with plenty of chairs for everyone and the grounds were perfectly groomed.  Most days we had the pool to ourselves and the water was so warm and comfortable.  Our room was comfortable and clean and our ocean view was priceless.  We saw dolphins daily.  They have room service daily if you want it.  My one complaint is that the air conditioner was super loud and clunked every time it turned off or on which was constantly.  We would have loved to hear the waves at night, but it was just too warm during our visit.  The kitchenette was so handy, the only thing missing was an oven. …

title: Clean well maintained property
review: My family and I had a blast. Didn't wanna leave when our time was up. Need anything at night or local knowledge just ask mike the security guard at night. My wife and I took a late flight with the kids (10 and 7), we were flustered and Mike helped a lot.

title: Wonderful - Wonderful
review: This is very nice hotel, very clean, outstanding customer service. Right on the beach, quit and secured place.  Very good value for the money. The only thing I didn't like - the town(Estero) itself is outdated, no good restaurants close by and no night life like in Miami. But if you are looking for quite place - this is it. Relax and enjoy.

title: Excellent Experience
review: I really enjoyed staying at Sandpiper Gulf Resort.  The staff was friendly and informative.  The room was clean and the grounds were immaculate.  I will definitely be back again next year.  The rooms have full kitchens which is a nice feature and the prices are very reasonable.  Good Job!!!

title: Good for what it is.
review: Bear in mind that I would not visit Fort Myers Beach in season if it were free. Too many people, too crowded, a compact jumbling mess. But, if you do go, or out of season like we did, you could do far worse than the Sandpiper.   It is a quaint hotel on the beach, two pools - one for adults and all sorts of other amenities. It is not fancy, but pleasant and well cared for. Staff are friendly and very helpful. Laundry on site.   We got bumped to a beach view room - lovely - and they all had comfortable decks to enjoy. Pool room views also have patios and I think they would be horrible in season. They are too close to the pool and afford little privacy. So, I guess my advice is get an ocean view room in season if you can afford it.

title: Fantasic Hotel In the most Fantastic Location
review: Very warm welcome from the staff, really helpful recommending restaurants and gaining discounts when booking tables for you,  Thank you Angel and Marcia.  Fantastic rooms, Free VOSS water for you along with a beach bag to take home with you. The best pool to swim in.  Our maid Manouchca was great , kept the room spotless.

title: Beautifully maintained
review: We had a great stay here.   Everything was well maintained and kept immaculately clean.  Kitchen unit had a full size refrigerator and full set of dishes & small appliances.   Beds are good and rooms are very quiet.   Nice family pool and a separate adults only pool.   Right on the beach with good view of ocean & sunsets.

title: Great resort!
review: After reading the reviews we booked our time at this resort and were so pleased! The location is excellent and the rooms are wonderful! The beach is also amazing. Staff was super helpful in places to dine and directions! Overall a 5+

title: Restful and comfy with lovely, uncrowded beach
review: We chose this hotel after reading rave reviews on Trip Advisor and were not disappointed. We stayed for six nights and were so comfy there that we ate out only three times.  It is located in the central part of Estero Island, so it is not crowded and is far from some of the construction to the north.  (To avoid construction, which slows traffic during daylight hours, take the Tamiami Trail or Route 75 to Bonita Springs and approach Fort Meyers Beach from the south.)  Check-in was easy, and the staff was friendly and accommodating.  We had a clean, modern ocean front suite on the first floor. (There are no elevators).  It was a large room with two double beds, a wall-mounted flat screen TV, a sofa, a table with four chairs, and a kitchenette with a full-size refrigerator and…

title: We love this place!
review: Just back from our 5th visit to the Sandpiper in as many years, or 'the yellow hotel' as we tend to call it! After a week of Clearwater and Orlando, it was great to come here and relax for the week. On most days we were barely out of swimwear, chilling on our balcony, in and ort of the pool, and then a glass of wine on the beach later for the sunset. The rooms are very nice (though some of the kitchenettes are getting a bit worn now), but being able to pop down the road to Publix to stock up on provisions is great. Wristbands are given to all those staying that operate as keys to the room and pool, this was great for my 10 year old daughter as she could come and go in the safe resort environment. Would be nice if Angel on reception could crack a smile every now and again, and…

title: LAID BACK
review: I traveled toto here with mymy mom.  It was a very stress free vacation. I really enjoyed taking trip 3 minuets away on a trolley, picking out breakfasts, and dinners and being able to cook it and casually eat it at my convenience. For example, on my balcony or on beach or in my room. Spectacular, calm view from the dining tables in the rooms. Lots of beach walk. Millions of  different shells for miles. Great sunsets.  Great change of pace.

title: One of our top 5 vacation spots
review: Everything at the resort was perfect... The staff was helpful and friendly, the grounds were well kept and manicured. The amenities were many and top of the line. Great beds and contemporary decor. Everything you needed was right there. Would definitely return and highly recommend for all types of families.

title: Great View
review: The Sandpiper is in a great location, this part of the beach is less crowded and only a short driving distance to the more touristy areas. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the grounds were well-maintained. The best part is every room at this resort has an ocean view and balcony or patio - beautiful! I would definitely recommend this place.

title: Pleasant
review: The hotel doesn't have a restaurant, but it is right on the beach.  A grocery is down the Street.  The rooms/hotel were clean, the staff, friendly.  I would especially point out Tim, at the desk.  He was very helpful and patient, to us gringos. Mike,the secrjity guard, came after hours, promptly, when we had a problem with Something in the room.  If I were to return to the area, I would go back to the sandpiper. P.S. The rooms have kitchenettes.

title: Excellent service for reasonable money
review: We had a room with a direct view of the ocean, where we could see beautiful sunsets from our balcony. The perfect setting at the hotel, combined with very good service from the staff, where Mike and Tim did a great job making us feeling like we were home, made the stay at the Sandpiper Gulf Resort very pleasant.

title: Beautiful resort!
review: Wonderful, spacious room, pleasant staff, great beach! Having an adult only pool as well as a family pool is a great option. Plenty of outdoor seating, bbq grills and well maintained grounds.  The location is perfect, close to everything and in a less crowded part of the beach.

title: Perfect place to stay!
review: As you discovered, Fort Myers Beach is known as a casual and relaxed destination. We are delighted that you enjoyed our beachfront location, comfortable accommodations, and excellent staff. Thank you and we would love to have you back!  Kindest regards,  Maredith Rizzo Public Relations Manager

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: This resort was beyond on our expectations.  Great poolside room with a beach view. It was quiet and very relaxing.  The rooms were so clean and loved the kitchen!  Plenty of room for 4 people!  The beach access is amazing, it was literally a few step and the beach was perfect!!!  The entire resort was clean and very nice!!!  The staff was always smiling, nice and very helpful!  I highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to relax on vacation!  Thanks again and can't wait until the next time!

title: our stay at the sandpiper
review: we got a really good deal on this hotel so wasnt really expecting anything to good, we were shocked it was perfect on the beach kids pool adults only pool , reasonable deckchair rental, coffee on tap all day , staff were amazing the cleaners even did my washing up!!!!!!!!!!!! room was spotless and free toiletries were of a good brand, beds were comfy and you couldnt here the thunderstorms we had almost every day once the patio doors were closed , the staff were so helpful check in check out was straight forward plenty of parking and on the quieter end of ft myers beach only a 5 min drive to times square for shops restaurants etc you can also use the facilties in their sister resort the pink shell resort which was more upmarket and more expensive lol 10 out of 10 would stay again

title: Great place to stay!
review: Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience at the Sandpiper. I am very pleased to read that we provided a service beyond your expectations. A memorable stay is what we work to provide and I am happy we were able to create this for you and your family. We would love to have you back with us again soon.  Kindest regards,  Maredith Rizzo Public Relations Manager

title: What A Great Surprise!
review: My husband and I stayed at The Sandpiper Gulf Resort from 8-19-15 to 8-22-15 and we would gladly return!   At check-in, they were very helpful and efficient and I was given a free beach bag which really came in handy during our stay.  Our room was updated, clean and spacious.  We had a full kitchen.  The best part was the private balcony overlooking the pool and beach!  We were very comfortable during our stay and enjoyed the location-right on the beach. I highly recommend the Sandpiper Gulf Resort!

title: Old Florida with today's amenities
review: I booked the Sandpiper Gulf Resort after reading some great reviews.  We stayed for 4 nights over the Labor Day Weekend.  We arrived on Saturday and were greeted in the parking lot by Tim.  What a great guy - he assisted us finding a parking space - my husband has Parkinson’s Disease and Tim brought us a luggage cart and helped us to our room.  Angel checked us in and gave us all the details of the motel.  Our room over looked the adult pool and could not have been any better - the room was appointed very nicely and very clean.  Kudos to the housekeeping staff.  The view was beautiful!  There were two gentlemen who each day just kept moving around cleaning the grounds.  They did not stop - from cleaning the grills, sweeping the sand off the patio, washing the sidewalks - they…

title: Another perfect stay
review: Thank you for your recent visit to the Sandpiper. It is wonderful to know that our associates were quick to respond to your needs. Thank you for mentioning the many positive experiences you encountered during your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Great stay
review: I stayed in the courtyard view room close to the office. Rooms are extremely clean and the resort is just amazing. I've stayed here for years and they just changed up the rooms a bit and they look even cleaner. This is such a awesome place to rent definately a come back place anytime. Staff was very welcoming and always had fresh coffee which was a plus! FMB is the nicest beach around... See you next year

title: You won't be sorry - you stayed!
review: Thank you for returning to the Sandpiper year after year. What wonderful memories you have in creating this tradition to visit Fort Myers Beach. We can’t wait to welcome you back next year.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: First time was awesome!
review: Our family has been coming to the Sandpiper since 1982 and we have thoroughly enjoyed everything about it.  The staff has always been extremely friendly and will do whatever it takes to make you happy.  The maintenance people are right on top of things when they don't work.  The front desk staff is knowledgeable and friendly.  We love it there.

title: Great family vacation!
review: The staff was friendly and helpful, the room was wonderful and had a perfect view of the beach!  I would definitely stay here again! The room was neat/clean, plenty of room for all four of us and my whole family enjoyed it.

title: Poor customer service
review: I am thrilled to know that you had such a wonderful first impression of our resort. Thank you for the compliments of our large accommodations, cleanliness of the resort, and friendliness of our associates. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Quiet Time at Sandpiper
review: We spent 4 nights at the Sandpiper, very nice room with a view of the pool.  Quiet area, even though it was near the family pool!  The ocean water was not very clear for some reason we only went in 1 or 2 times.  Everything was close by car only, no place to walk.  The folks who run the place are very nice, housekeeping was very good.  All in all a very good place that I would recommend to everyone.

title: Price more than reasonable for all you get.
review: Thanks to my friend Elizabeth D. from The Pink Shell who recommended this resort.  The place was spacious, beautifully decorated, very clean and the staff very friendly.  The grounds were well maintained, the view from my balcony was overlooking the pool and the gulf and it was beautiful.  I definitely am looking forward to staying here again on my next visit to the beautiful Fort Meyers Beach area.

title: What a wonderful trip and a great place to stay
review: This is a wonderful place to stay.  The room service was wonderful each day.  The employees were so friendly and helpful.  We were close to Sanibel Island and plenty of restaurants.  The location is perfect, close to the airport, shopping, etc. Had the pleasure of staying 11 days with a wonderful friend and we had a blast!!!  A great place for families, couples or a girl's trip!  Would highly recommend this beautiful ocean front resort. We went in august and the weather was perfect!!!

title: GREAT PLACE FOR VACATION!
review: The resort was beautiful with a caribbean look, very clean and right on the ocean. The management staff were great and always present for any needs with a nice friendly attitude. Housekeeping staff was great and our room was cleaned and fresh every day with the most comfortable beds and everything needed in the kitchen. If you get a chance to visit Ft Myers Beach I would definitely recommend this place!

title: Great place to stay
review: This is a lovely place to stay right on the beach in Fort Myers. Stayed 3/7/15 - 6/7/15. Booked a room with kitchenette.  Everything very clean.  Service was very efficient and friendly. Perfect for families.  Fourth of July celebrations brilliant. We had a third floor room so loved the view of fireworks (& also waking up to the beautiful beach each morning) Would definitely stay here again.  Only two criticisms were that our beds were very soft - gave me a sore back and there was no elevator in our building so that meant carrying suitcases up.  If you anticipate difficulties re this - best to book a ground floor.   Make sure you pay the little extra and have the room right on the beach - this is a must.

title: Nice but could be better for price
review: Our room had soda all down the front of the fridge when we arrived.  Sand on the floor upon arrival and while we were there.  Seems cleaning staff does not vacuum or sweep it up during your stay.   Our pillows were trashed.  Again for $200 plus you should not have wadded up nylon for pillows. If you want to stay on the beach it offers 2 great pools and the staff upon arrival and during our stay were very nice.  The small things that I mentioned would not deture me from staying again.

title: Before school started a
review: I apologize for the condition of your room upon check-in. Please notify us immediately if anything in your room does not seem quite right or up to standard. We can then make the necessary improvements or if we have another room available, make a change. I would like to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort on your next visit to Fort Myers Beach.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Great place for family
review: It was really a nice experience we love the room the staff was great and we had a great time, room had kitchen and we were able to make our own food the room was very clean  the bathroom updated. We stayed in the ocean view the view was excellent. I will come back again we love this hotel

title: Great hotel in Fort Myers
review: We have stayed at the Sandpiper in the past and were once again thrilled with our stay. We have taken our two littles in the past but took our two bigger kiddos this time as well. The six of us had the best time and we can attribute part of that to our stay at the Sandpiper. The resort is clean, and definitely family-friendly. The staff was great, and extremely helpful. The rooms were spotless, the beach is free of garbage. There is a lot for family to do. The family pool was great for the kids, quiet and clean. We couldn't have been any more pleased with our stay, and would absolutely recommend it to any other travelers looking to stay in the area. There is a shuttle service and a nearby Publix for grocery shopping. We ordered pizza to be delivered and enjoyed dinner from our…

title: Great week
review: We stayed at the Sandpiper and it exceeded our expectations. Very nice room , great adult pool, awesome views of the Gulf and a wonderful accommodating staff. I have never seen staff to work as hard as the employees of the Sandpiper.. They were constantly cleaning  the walk ways, the landscaping, the pool area , even sprayed down the stairway leading to the upper floor rooms. Very accommodating staff ! Employees make a company , if you have surround yourself with good people you will succeed, needless to say the Sandpiper is a huge success.. We will be back!

title: Great hotel all around
review: From the time we checked it everything was great. Tim at the front desk did everything he could to accommodate my handicap situation. He moved sun and sky to get me the perfect room. During my stay everything was great the maintenance men were extremely helpful in every way. Even on the day we checked out. Due to the fact my plane was leaving layer in the day the lady and the front desk moved earth and sky to allow me a later check out. The hotel is clean well taken care of and I would definitely recommend it to any one. Thanks all the employees at the sandpiper

title: Nice little resort
review: Thank you for this detailed review of our resort. We are happy to have left you with a great impression of the Pink Shell through our service. We would be delighted to have you stay with us again.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Great Gulf Front Resort
review: This was a nice choice for our lil' family reunion.  Staff was VERY friendly and accommodating. Right on the beach with parking.  Free wifi, though not very strong/reliable service. The beds were not very comfortable but the linens and towels were very clean as was the rest of the room.  Kitchen was great to have and had many pots and cooking utensils.  Also provided, plates, bowls, coffee  cups, drinking glasses. Big screen TV and a dvd player.  2 pools, one of them designated for adults only, which can be nice to have.   Resort is not too far from a publix grocery store and many restaurants and shops.   Very nice overall, especially since it has been renovated recently.

title: Hotel
review: Stayed in one of the Gulf front suites, not sure why others complain because ours was freshly painted, new linens and drapes, new sofa. Housekeeping was wonderful, I was so pleased with the service I left a tip each day. Plenty of clean towels, toiletries, free newspaper in the office each morning along with fresh hot coffee and ice cold lemon water all day. Bracelets instead of key cards is a great idea, just left it on all week.  And even though I made our reservation through expedia, the resort was more than willing give me the first floor unit I requested. I have stayed at 3 other places on the beach over the past 12 years but the past 2 vacations have been at the Sandpiper and I won't go anywhere else.

title: Awesome Vacay!
review: We loved staying at Sandpiper!! This is our 4th year and can't wait to go again!! Rooms are clean and plenty of room!! Newly remodeled and very clean!!  The staff is excellent and very helpful. Special thanks goes to Tim, Angel, and Michelle!! Always willing to assist us no matter what we asked!! Beautiful clean beaches!! See you next year !!

title: best vacation I ever had
review: stayed here, with my grandaughter Zoie,and it was the best hotel I have stayed in.When I booked the vacation,I had requested a room on the top floor.To my suprise,it had an ocean/beach view.The room was amazing,like a suite with a nice kitchen area with tv,a couch by the balcony door,and the room was very cleanand nicely decorated.awesome family pool,gas grills by the adult pool,and the staff was the best I've seen.I want to especially thank Michelle,she went out of her way to help us and her personality was a pleasant suprise.I will come back to Fort Myers Beach and I will stay at the "Sandpiper Gulf Resort",I want the same room.If you're planning a vacation to Fort Myers Beach,you must stay here,it is 100% family friendly and you won't find a better beach hotel experience !!!

title: Awesome
review: This motel is a hidden gem. Have been to 47 states and this is the best beachfront property we have had the pleasure of staying at. Loved the free water and bag when checked in. Stayed four nights in room 404. It was very clean and quiet. The beach is gorgeous. Used the wave runners twice with a good experience each time. Office staff very helpful.

title: Vacation
review: The Sandpiper Gulf Resort is very family friendly and great location. Our families have been coming here for 10 plus years. The staff has always been very helpful and friendly. Would highly recommend the Resort. The rooms were clean and comfortable also we received a beach bag and complimentary water. Love this Resort. Tim from the front desk and Mike from security were always very helpful and friendly.

title: Nice resort!
review: We stayed here for a week!  Nice big rooms, very clean,  kitchenette too! Staff was very friendly!  Adult pool was nice for a relaxing swim! Just wished they have a restaurant/bar. A pain having to go somewhere to eat everytime.

title: Vacation
review: My husband and I stayed 2 nights...the beds were so comfortable..we wanted to take them home with us. We got complimentary water and a beach bag. We also loved the idea of not having to carry a key card...you get waterproof bracelets.

title: Impressive Well Managed Hotel
review: This week was our first visit to Sandpiper, and I suspect that our family of three will return in the future. The hotel has to be one of the best managed and maintained beachside hotel properties that I've been too in a long time. I base this statement upon the quality of service from the personnel from the desk mgr to the room cleaning team. Everyone was professional, friendly, and made us feel welcomed.  We booked our stay through another site, and was failed to request a room either on the first floor or one assessable by an elevator. The staff appeared eager to assist us in getting the right room, and upon arriving, made it clear that if we were not pleased with the room, that something could possibly be done to make things just right. The room ended up being just fine, with…

title: Shady
review: This was our first trip to sandpiper and I assure you it will be our last. We paid for our full stay months in advance. When we checked in they needed a card for "incidentals". He said we would not be charged anything. I checked my bank account 30 min later and they took $150 from my account. That was our grocery money. I was left with  $25 dollars in the bank. She said that when we checked out we would get it back. And when I said that no one said anything about charging my account she could care less. I said I would never be back. Her answer was that was ok. Worst costumer service experience ever. Sad because the place has potential. Beautiful beach, clean pools and nice rooms. But due to there shady business practices we will never ever be back. Broke my child's heart. And…

title: Awesome stay!
review: I am very disappointed to know of your recent experience at our resort. I apologize that the hold on your debit card was not more thoroughly explained. This is a procedure that we must do with all of our guests. The hold is to cover incidentals such as broken items or damage to the room. We recommend using a credit card instead of a debit card for this hold. Once the guest checks out, the hold is released. I'm sorry that this experience left you with feelings of not wanting to return. Should you visit the Fort Myers Beach area again, we would be delighted to be given a second chance to provide you with a stress free vacation.     Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: First Time at Sandpiper Gulf Resort
review: This was our first trip to the Gulf side and we could not be  happier that we chose to stay at the Sandpiper! Staff was great! Hotel is clean! Mike and the staff at the rental booth out front were awesome!  The Sandpiper doesn't have a a lot of amenities but it doesn't need any! It is close to everything you need yet has a more private feel. We will stay here again! Loved it!

title: Chill out holiday
review: We looked up and down the gulf coast to find a hotel that was right on the beach but now so busy it would take away from our ability to actually relax. The Sandpiper Gulf Resort was a perfect fit. It is centrally located to a lot of stuff to do in the area but the beach was peaceful and not crowded at all.  The resort was clean and comfortable, the staff were very helpful and personable. Tim and Mike seemed like they were always there and willing to help out with even the smallest of requests. The beach was easily accessible and the resort staff were great in supplying us with towels to take with us. Our room was clean and beautiful. The fact that their sister hotel was the pink shell down the beach was a much added value to this hotel as well. You can gain entrance there with…

title: We'd stay again. Beautiful beach, wonderful room, excellent staff.
review: This was our second stay. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, including the kitchenette which was very convenient and well stocked with utensils. The beach is huge, clean and uncrowded, and the beautiful adults only pool is something that we haven't seen anywhere else. There are grills and tables near the beach and the pool where you can enjoy a meal or watch the sunset with a glass of your favorite beverage.

title: Tranquil and relaxing
review: Beautiful location on Fort Myers Beach. Very clean and well maintained. Rooms seemed newly renovated with ceramic tile through out the room and new kitchen cabinets and furniture. The adult pool was excellent for relaxing and enjoying the tropical gulf breeze.

title: Terrific getaway destination. Right on the sand, and the beach is not crowded.
review: This is a wonderful beachfront resort.  Beach is not crowded (even on a holiday weekend!).  Water sports on the premises, 2 clean pools, and a short drive to night life and dining.  Service staff friendly and accommodating.  We viewed dolphins as close as 50 yards from shore in the early morning, and the sunrise walks along the beach were special.  We opted for a room with a beach view balcony- worth the upgrade!  We will return often!

title: Fabulous location, updated furniture,  fully equipped kitchens, comfortable beds, wonderful beach.
review: The SandPiper should be rated much higher.  We had an oceanfront facing room on the first floor.  The view from every part of the room was incredible.  The terrace is huge, wide with lounging chairs so you can sunbathe there if you wish and watch the incredible sunsets.  Very very clean room, spotless bathroom with plenty of towels and toiletries.  Kitchens are fully equipped with all you need.  Publix and 7/11 just 2 minutes away on Estero Blvd. and many wonderful restaurants in the area.  We had a unit with 2 double beds an a sofa bed, dining area + kitchen and there was ample room to move around.  Good for couples and families with children.  There is a coin operated laundry room on ea. floor, soft drinks vending machine and ice as well.  An adult pool and a family pool with…

title: We'll be back!
review: White sugar sand, clear water, great sunset views! "Tim from Detroit" checked us in, offering a fresh cup of coffee, provided great dining recommendations (with clear directions to each locale), and had fresh coffee again at our (incredibly early) checkout four days later. (Thanks, Tim!!) Our room attendant was very nice and friendly (smiling genuinely as we briefly exchanged where we each were from) and we always came back to a freshly-cleaned space! Clean bedding, towels, bath, kitchenette, floors, furniture...everything. (Thank you "nice smiling lady from Haiti" for making it a nice place to come back to!) The "Beach Chair/Seadoo Rental Guys" were all friendly, and accommodating and kept a clean beach. (Thanks, guys!) No restaurant, but talk to Tim...and there are plenty of…

title: Unexpected Upgrade
review: The parking area is for free, u need a car to discover the whole area around Fort Myers Beach. The Hotel itself has a direct entry to the beach but no restaurant just a BBQ place where u have to grill your meat by your own. It has also a pool area which we didn't use due to the sea in front of the hotel. The restaurants and shopping centers are quite far away, a car is needed. The staff was friendly and explained us where we can eat etc. We got an upgrade to the honeymoon suite due to construction work that was really nice!

title: Nice hotel
review: I am so happy that you discovered Fort Myers Beach and chose to stay with us. I am glad you enjoyed your upgraded room and our beautiful beach. We look forward to your return.   Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: GREAT PLACE TO STAY!!!
review: Parking was free, nice staff/ receptionist, we got an upgrade to the honeymoon sweet was just amazing, car is needed to do something from this point, no restaurant in the hotel only a grill place, breakfast was not offered, directly on the beach

title: Excellent resort!
review: Thank you for your recent visit to the Sandpiper. Your compliments of our accommodations and friendly associates are much appreciated. We were happy to have you as our guest and would love to see you return.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Beach Resort
review: Everything from check in to check out was perfect. Clean room, friendly staff "Tim from Detroit", Parking was easy. Pools and beach were Great. Could not have been better. Great sunset views. We will be back for sure....

title: Simple. Yet, fabulous!
review: We were surprised to find a family friendly resort that could satisfy a couple traveling without children.  The ocean is steps from the property, and the views of the sunsets are breathtaking.  There is the option of cooking your own meals, and purchasing groceries from a supermarket less than a mile away.  We stayed in a unit that had two top burners, a full size refrigerator, coffee maker, and a toaster.  I liked it that we could use one of the many propane grills on the property to grill when we chose too.  There are several places to eat that are close proximity to the resort--for every budget. There is a trolly that runs along Estero Blvd and can zip you into Times Square. I'd suggest having a rental car if you're here for a week or longer.  There are so many beautiful…

title: Right on the beach!
review: I am so happy that as a traveling couple, you had a relaxing stay at the Sandpiper. Thank you for providing some wonderful traveling tips to our future visitors. We look forward to your return.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Clean, friendly and a beautiful beach side
review: We went on spring break and just loved the fact that our room was basically right on the beach.  We stayed in an ocean-front, bottom floor room and loved how large our patio was.  The weather was perfect.  Very nice hotel.  Surprised that we had a full size refrigerator and we sure did fill it!  Wish they had a snack bar or a tiny little snack shop.  The grocery store is close but in my opinion, too far to walk.  We called for taxis to take us everywhere.  They were quick and not expensive.  Great place to stay for a quiet vacation.

title: Great Resort!!!!
review: I am so happy to read of the wonderful time you had at our resort during your recent family vacation. It is our pleasure to exceed your expectations and provide a service that adds great value to your stay. We look forward to your next return.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Great place to stay
review: we stay for one night but everything was perfect, good bed, nice Team, beautiful beach and pools, best is 2 seperate pools for adults and families. Good sugestions on the front desk for dinner and breakfast. we will come back.

title: Very pleasant and relaxing destination
review: The first thing I want to mention is their website is extremely accurate and reflects the reality of this destination to a tee.  As a couple we seemed to have fell into the mega resort trap the last several years. Our last vacation at one of those all inclusive behemoths left us wanting something much simpler and more tailored towards our basic needs while on vacation. The Sandpiper was perfect for us!  The room was as if it was our apartment on the beach and felt like home. The kitchen gave us dining options and had all of the appliances and utensils typically found in any kitchen these days. Our room had two large flat screen TV's which provided the simple choice of viewing from either the bedroom or front room. The ocean, beach and sunset views from our private 5th floor…

title: Will be back!
review: Thank you for this wonderfully detailed review of your experiences and encounters while visiting the Sandpiper. I am so pleased that you felt well informed of our resort and the surrounding area through our website. This is very important to us.  We look forward to serving you again.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Clean, well-maintained facilities and rooms with great oceanfront balconies.
review: I am a repeat customer every December and will be back!  The rooms are small but clean!  Staff is friendly and the grounds and location are wonderful.  I don't care about Wifi, television, etc.  I want clean, convenient, beautiful beach and that's what you get with this place.  There are nicer and more fancy places but you will pay for them.  And on the beach, there are definitely much dumpier places, too.  This place seems to attract the same loyal bunch year after year and that says something.

title: Dishonest about price
review: We thank you for being a frequent visitor to the Sandpiper. I am pleased to know that we offer the same great service each time you stay with us. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to provide you with total comfort and relaxation. We look forward to your next visit.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Awesome stay
review: I booked this for my wife, me and our three children (ages 13, 10, 8).  I somehow got the impression there was a separate bedroom, but all the rooms are efficiencies.  However, it was a very nice, clean, and comfortable room, and I really enjoyed the oceanfront balcony.  The facilities are simple but very well maintained and pleasant.  Good value and great location, a little further down the island from the hustle and bustle of the north end, and I appreciated the relative quiet.  There is a separate company that provides ocean activity rentals right on the beach (waverunners, parasailing, etc) and it was very easy to rent from them.  It was nice having the beach and a swimming pool both so easily accessible.

title: Comedy of errors
review: I have a previous review of this hotel from last year, and because it was so good we decided to go back. I booked by telephone as I wanted a particular room and thought no more of it until a week before we went. I emailed to say I had no confirmation and received a response that they had no record of me. I reminded them of the date I had paid and they suddenly remembered. When we arrived I paid for the second night and then found I was allocated a  room I didn't want, so I asked for the correct room or a full refund of my payments. After a while of discussion with the manager I was upgraded to a slightly better room with no extra cost. I was thinking, anyone can make a mistake, its how they deal with it thats important, and still feeling positive, had a lovely couple of days…

title: Great location for Spring break and catching a few ball games!
review: We thank you for returning to the Sandpiper. I do apologize that you were not satisfied with your recent visit. For the errors that were made, I am sorry. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back so that we may show you the level of service we are known for and all that we have to offer.   Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Beachfront Bliss!
review: Loved this small, laid back family friendly hotel. I would recommend it to anyone going down to the Fort myers area  with the intention of going to Twins or Red Sox games and enjoying some beach time too. So nice to come back to a clean room every day. Loved the beach towel service! With a full size refrigerator, 2 burn stove and toaster in room along with the grills in the courtyard we only ate out once all week! Grocery store within a mile. Love Fort Myers  beach for the lovely sand - and you can get on the island from the north or south which is helpful with the traffic on the North end.

title: Great location right on the Gulf!
review: I've been to many parts of Florida, but this was by far the most relaxing adventure yet. The rooms are immaculate, offering many amenities including an adult only pool, around the clock coffee service and refreshing lemon water. Our room had a gorgeous view of the beach. It was serene to wake up and sit on the balcony watching the dolphins play as the sun rose. The staff was helpful, offering assistance as needed with the onsite grills and inquiring about our stay. If you're looking for an amazing experience, Sandpiper is your place!

title: Fabulous, beautiful, new looking, catered to!
review: Thank you for this wonderful review! I am so delighted that you were pleased with our resort and all we have to offer. We can't wait to have you back again!  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Great time @ Fort Myers Beach
review: Arrived at the Sandpiper around check - in time 4PM - check in was fast and easy.  Had a beach view room overlooking the adult only pool.  Wished we had one of the beach front rooms, but there weren't any available when we booked back in January.  It was spring break after all.  Resort was clean and bright, wished it had a bar/restaurant.  Resort is located mid-island and far enough away from the very crowded, "Times Square" area.  We used the trolley and only left the island once to visit Thomas Edison/Henry Ford Winter Estate.  WiFi worked well in the rooms and pool area.

title: Excellent!!!
review: How nice that you were able to enjoy the beauty of Fort Myers Beach and the surrounding area. We were happy to have you as our guest and would love to see you return.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Perfect.
review: We loved the time we spent at the Sandpiper.  5 people(2 Adults, 3 children(15, 2, 6 months), the room was perfect.  The beach was close to room, beach chairs easy to rent.   The only drawback was there was no bar/restaurant on the property.  We did use the grills and they were maintained well and very clean.  We took recommendations from the staff for restaurants to eat in the evening, and the food was good.  We were able to eat with the small children and not feel rushed.

title: Great vacation!!
review: Loved it.  Room was perfect, amenities were perfect, staff friendly and knowledgeable.  Appreciated recycling program.  Location was great because it was away from the hustle and bustle.  Very happy to have beach chair/umbrella rentals, jet ski rentals, etc. at our fingertips.

title: Decent Spot
review: We had a great time at Sandpiper Gulf Resort!! Very friendly staff both in the resort and on the beach. The manager, Tim was very helpful and the guys on the beach were very accommodating. Beautiful white sandy beach.  We will definitely be back!!

title: Mrs
review: Beautiful place. Good pricing even during spring break. Nice beach. Nice furnishings. And ...the all important comfortable bedding. It was very clean not even one hair in the bathroom. Staff very nice, real smiles. they like their jobs. Must be good management.

title: Sandpiper in Fort Meyers is Very Good
review: Great place & value for the money!  Spaceous, clean rooms with kitchen, just enough room for family of 4.  Well kept property overall, clean, with a nice pool.  The Manager, Tim was a very good host.  Kid-friendly for well-bahaved 9 & 8 year olds. Right on the beach, literally.  Beautiful white sandy beach. Shuffleboard and two nice grills for making your own dinner. Location: close to a Publix grocery & shopping.  Not a far drive to Sanibel/Captiva.

title: Amazing!
review: I am so happy to read of the wonderful time you had at our resort during your recent family vacation. It is our pleasure to exceed your expectations and provide a service that adds great value to your stay. Thank you for mentioning Tim by name for his great service. We look forward to your next return.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: We WILL be back...
review: Visited with my mom and 11 year old son.  Gulf view room with patio. Great beach!  Great pool!!  Great room!  Full kitchen, clean, very clean everything!  Will be back again.  Michelle at the desk and the rest of the staff were great!!!!

title: pricey but good
review: This was our first extended visit to the Gulf Coast of Florida and we could not have selected a better location to stay. Fort Myers Beach was great and our visit was further enhanced by our choice of the Sandpiper. The hotel was clean, bright, and welcoming. Even though it was pretty close to capacity, we NEVER felt crowded. Angel and Michelle were very friendly and available. The entire staff, from the efficient housekeepers to the maintenance folks were always very polite and smiling. The view from our 2nd floor beachfront room was AMAZING, especially the sunsets. Rooms and public areas were very clean, even the "public" grills were cleaned each day at least once per day.The "adult only" pool was a welcome reprieve, even though the family pool never got overly crowded/noisy.…

title: Great Vacation
review: This was our first time in Ft Myers Beach and the Sandpiper Gulf Resort was wonderful. Great People Angel and Michelle were Fabulous. The staff was wonderful. But the view well lets just say.. breath taking.. we shelled every day and walked the white (yes) white sand beach.. it was great to have grills on site we grilled out 3 nights and it was amazing we could sit and watch the ocean and enjoy dinner without the hassle of trying to drive somewhere. I would recommend this resort for anyone.. they had 2 pools one for families the other for just adults.. which makes it nice when you are not traveling with children. The beach is very long and it is just so peaceful. Loved every minute. We traveled with our best friends and we shared a room and it was plenty big for 4 adults.

title: Excellent Resort !!
review: Location ,cleanliness and accommodations are as good as it gets ! Angel and James as all the staff are wonderful .Endless coffee was always ready in the morning and very good . BBQ grills were cleaned daily and ready for use. Thank you for a great vacation !

title: great place
review: Nice, clean, quiet, away from the crowds at the north end.  Right on the beach.  Staff was very friendly.  Michelle at the front desk was very helpful.  Parking was difficult at time, especially if you came back late.  Definitely would stay again.

title: Best vacation spot right on Fort Myers Beach
review: How nice that you were able to enjoy the beauty of Fort Myers Beach. We were happy to have you as our guest and would love to see you return.  Warm regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Boutique Hotel
review: This was our 3rd time at the Sandpiper - the staff is amazing, the accommodations are wonderful, the place offers everything we need.  If something needs attention, the entire staff is right on it...we highly recommend the Sandpiper.  ~and special recognition to Tim at the front desk...he is always aware of what is going on and has the best recommendations for dining out.  As for the beach, the Sandpiper has the quietest beach in the entire area, no crowds - we love it there! ps-jet ski with the dolphins is right on the property and offers a guest discount - it's a must do!

title: very nice and friendly staying
review: room is not so big, but enough for 2 adults and 2 kids. balcony is great, with a view to the pool, and the beach. they have barbeques. nice and friendly staff.  I had a great time. it was a great pick for the money I paid.

title: A Great Experience
review: As you discovered, Fort Myers Beach is known as a casual and relaxed destination. I am delighted to know that you had an enjoyable time. Thank you, and we would love to have you back.  Warm regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Resort was clean and well maintained.
review: We had booked a two night stay prior to our ferry crossing to Key West.  Unfortunately, due to the snowstorm in NY we were stranded the first night in Charlotte NC. Without our pleading desk manager Angel arranged with his administration that we did not get charged for the missed night. We stayed in the very spacious suite above the front office with a wide balcony overlooking the pool area.  Our short stay did not allow us to explore all the amenities but with its well equipped kitchen it lends itself well to a longer stay.  We used a taxi recommended by Angel for the 45 minutes/$50. ride from the airport.  It helps to arrive early or late because traffic on Estero on nice days is crawling at best.

title: Anniversary
review: I am so pleased to read of your great experience at our resort. I am sorry that your trip was shorter than expected due to the snowy weather up north. We would be delighted to welcome you back again sometime soon.  Warm regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Affordable Scenic Beach Views
review: The beach view is beautiful and the service was excellent. Rooms were clean and the courtyard was well maintained. The heated pools were a nice touch. Shuffleboard and bean bag toss were a hit with the kids. Great family hotel!! We would highly recommend it.

title: Other than being charged $2 for a broken glass that broke by accident, the stay was absolutely fantastic.
review: The Ocean view Rooms were perfect.  The way they handled the free towels was great and the full kitchen was used by us quite a bit.  We used the gas grill near the adult pool to make steaks.  Great place.

title: A great location with plenty of clean beach for relaxing.
review: I am delighted to know that you had a fantastic stay at the Sandpiper. Thank you for your compliments of your great accommodation with kitchen and beach view. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Warm regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Perfect FL vacation
review: Traffic on and off the island is very slow and can take upwards of twenty minutes to go a half mile. but shopping and eating opportunities are within a mile in both directions. Kitchenette was a great option with groceries available a half mile away.

title: Perfect getaway
review: Thank you for your recent stay at our resort. I am happy to know that you and your family had an amazing time at the beach. We look forward to your return on your next Fort Myers Beach vacation.  Warm regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Guest satisfaction
review: Excellent stay at the Sandpiper Gulf Resort.  All of the staff we encountered were wonderful, friendly, and helpful.  The room was excellent, the bed comfortable, and the service of the cleaning staff was top-notch.  We definitely will be back, maybe not next year, but for sure in two years.  We will recommend the Sandpiper to our friends and family who are interested in vacationing in the Fort Myers area.

title: Wonderful resort to stay at.  Felt like I was staying right on the beach.  Extremely clean rooms and comfortable beds.
review: We stayed for a week and wish it could have been longer.  We had a beach front room and it was like living on the beach.  Wonderful large private patio off our room where you felt like you were sitting on the beach.  Room was very comfortable and we were impressed with the cleanliness of the unit.  Kitchen had full size refrigerator - microwave - and two burner stove.  No dishwasher but was surprised when the person cleaning our room did our dishes.  The beach is well maintained and you can walk for miles.   We will definitely be back next year.

title: Right on the beach!
review: We stayed  the last week of January was perfect, clean, nice rooms and very helpful staff.Planing on staying there again next year. Probably longer than a week next time. Close to everything very convenient.

title: The Sandpiper was fantastic!!
review: We enjoyed a wonderful week at the Sandpiper Gulf Resort!! The staff was always friendly and helpful, ready to make our stay perfect! The entire Resort was very clean and neat right down to the Gas Grills that always looked spotless! We had a Courtyard room with very comfortable Queen sized beds and a very nice Kitchenette and again very clean. The location is fantastic, right on the sunny Gulf of Mexico with that awesome sugary sand! There is a nice Publix store just up the road to the north and a CVS Pharmacy about the same distance to the south. There are two ways on and off Estero Island. Traffic dictates which route will work best on any given day. The ETA to the Airport is around 45 to 50 minutes. We enjoyed visits to Sanibel and Captiva Islands and down to the city of…

title: Great Stay on the Beach
review: I enjoyed my one night stay here.  I had a pedal bike delivered to the hotel and was able to bike south the first day and north the second day.  The staff was very helpful and our room had a nice patio overlooking the beach.

title: Right on the beach- wonderful resort
review: How nice that you were able to enjoy the beauty of Fort Myers Beach. Biking on Fort Myers Beach is a fun way to explore the area. We were happy to have you as our guest and would love to see you return.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Beautiful small resort hotel that had everything we wanted.
review: Stayed here the week of January 26th. The weather was a bit cool but the resort was wonderful. They had coffee and water outside of the lobby from 6 a.m. until 10 p.m. The rooms have all been remodeled and the decor is very tropical. Love the granite kitchen countertops and dining table with palm tree etched chairs. Beds were comfortable and our balcony was big with gorgeous view of the gulf. In front of the adult pool are umbrella tables and chairs facing the beach where we had our evening cocktails. Watched amazing sunsets from our balcony. There are grills for barbecuing. We would definitely go back.

title: Directly on the beach/Very clean/Great service
review: I love hearing how I guests enjoy the complimentary coffee and our remodeled rooms!  Sounds like you had some wonderful evenings watching the beautiful sunsets. I'm pleased to know that you plan to stay with us again on your next Fort Myers Beach vacation.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Wonderful Place for Beach Vacation
review: Just visited the Sandpiper Gulf Resort for the second time and enjoyed every minute. Great property right on the beach with recently remodeled rooms done to perfection. Close to shopping, restaurants, golf courses and attractions. The staff was extremely friendly especially Tim, Todd and Mike!! Will be back for sure. Ray K from Illinois

title: Overall Great Place on the Beach
review: We stayed here for a 2 day beach vacation and this place fit the bill.  Rooms are clean and large enough with kitchenette and porch. The Beach is perfect and chair and umbrella rentals were available. It was quiet and everyone was very accommodating. Complimentary water and beach bag was perfect and needed.

title: Friendly staff, nice beach. Nice Facility with 2 pools and recently renovated units.
review: I am thrilled to hear you had an outstanding vacation at the Sandpiper. What wonderful memories you have from your recent visit. Thank you for choosing us amongst all other Fort Myer Beach hotels and resorts. We can’t wait to welcome you back.  Warmest regards,  Bonni Delizia General Manager

title: Unforgettable holidays
review: We booked a package tour included this hotel and it was better than expected. all was clean, the room was big and got its own kitchen, the staff was friendly and gave tips for dining, attractions etc. The beach is direct in front of the hotel and there were two pools, one for families and one for adults only. The only negative point was the connecting door to the next room, that wasn’t soundproof.

title: A gem of a resort that exceeded our expectations that we didn't want to leave.
review: This is a great perfect sized room overlooking the gulf/beach views that had a nice modern kitchenette. The beds were very comfortable as well as the pull out couch. The beach was very nice and very close, lovely to listen to the waves at night through the large glass/screen sliding door off of a generous deck. The pools were very clean, warm and had great views of the beach/ ocean. Dolphins came through one day as well. It was very close to a lovely little beach town with nice shopping, restaurants, live music playing by the nice peer. Everything was wonderful, didn't want to leave. Am planning on returning here again. The staff was exceptional and helpful. They even had bottled VOSS water and a cute beach bag to have in our room when we arrived.

title: So happy we found this place !
review: Superb staff, grounds very well kept, literally steps to the beautiful beach, rooms were impeccably clean , beds quite comfortable and overall room amenities were great !  We will return for sure and even our Florida family who came to visit us commented on such a great find !

title: Excellent service BEFORE even arriving!
review: I had very specific needs my moms due to her physical limitations.  I tried booking through the reservation line with my special needs and the agent was not able to guarantee my requests.  She kindly suggested I contact the hotel directly and provided me the number.  I was lucky enough to be helped by the front desk person, Angel, who truly was an "angel" in this case.  He was patient , understanding and most accommodating.  If his service is any indication of what to expect during our stay, I simply can not wait to get there!  Angel's attitude and willingness to go above and beyond what I consider the "norm" to be these days is exemplary.  He is a true asset to this hotel.  If I had to hire someone for my own business, I would not hesitate to offer him a job.  Thank you Angel!

title: This is a fantastic place to stay right on the white sandy beach!
review: We had an Oceanside room, bottom level with a nice big patio, where we had our breakfast listening to the ocean and watching dolphins! The room was spacious with a kitchenette.  The staff was friendly - the grounds were clean & tropical. The 2 swimming pools were clean and never crowded. I would stay again and again!!

title: Fort Myers Beach
review: Very nice Resort and The location is perfect and staff very friendly. Love the White Sand. Housekeeping nice.  We did not like the location of the Bathroom Sink outside the bathroom but that's just how the rooms are.

title: Great location and beautiful beachfront!
review: Everything from checking in to our departure was great.  Help with bags, the room, grounds, location and of course beautiful beachfront to relax on.  Wifi access throughout the resort.  Nice kitchenettes with full size refrigerators. Will definitely be back.

title: Wonderful Stay
review: I am so pleased that your stay was enjoyable from start to finish. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you and create an exceptional first time experience. We hope to have you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Beautiful Beach
review: We stayed at the beautiful Sandpiper Resort in Dec 2014 for a weeks stay.  When we arrived we checked in with Michelle who gave us an overview of the resort and area attractions. The resort has 2 pools, one is adult only which we did use a couple of afternoons. Our room and the resort was clean and well maintained. The beach is fabulous! We felt safe during our stay as the key bracelets also get you into the gates to the courtyard.  Our room was on the courtyard level and during our stay we met many nice people who were grilling.  It is a nice option if you don't want to eat out each evening. The Publix grocery store is just up the street. The kitchen in the room has every thing you need to cook and a full size fridge. The staff was amazing and they were always checking to make…

title: Great last minute getaway on the beach.
review: I am so happy you had a wonderful stay at our resort. Thank you for your compliments of our beautiful beach, your clean accommodation and our friendly associates. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Very Relaxing Place
review: Upon check-in Angel was very helpful and kind. Our room was in the corner of the tower not the best location for room views, but we were to be on the the beach and relax..The Sandpiper has 2 pools kept very nicely, my kids were constantly going back and forth between the beach and kid pool. They have genesis grills on-site that we used several times, nice to cook burgers and hot-dogs just feet from the beach.  Ultimately this is good location, not as busy as downtown with some great restaurants nearby..I would not hesitate to stay here again.

title: Sandpiper Christmas Vacation. Love this place! Best place to stay on the beach!
review: How nice that you were able to enjoy the beauty of Fort Myers Beach. We were happy to have you as our guest and would love to see you return.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: An idlyllic setting on fabulous sandy beach
review: If you are planning a visit to the Gulf/Ft. Meyers Area I recommend staying at the Sandpiper.  Great for couples traveling alone or with children.  Rentals located right on the beach which makes it very convenient. We rented a cabana several times during our visit. They also have wave runner, dolphin tours, paddle boards and para sail excursions.  Friendly and helpful staff .  I have stayed on the beach many times and this is the best value around if wanting to be right on the beach.

title: Good value for money
review: I am so delighted that you chose to spend the Christmas holiday with us. Thank you for your highest recommendations. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Loved it!
review: Our family of four stayed here for five nights over the Christmas holidays.  Our room, fronting the sandy beach and next to the swimming pool had two large double beds, a kitchen with  a HUGE refrigerator and freezer and a large balcony overlooking the beach and sea.  The bathroom was very small but functional.  At the front desk they had coffee and newspapers and a computer for guests.  The wifi was good most of the time.  Parking was adjacent to the rooms but not in every case directly in front. A large Publix grocery store was within a half mile to the north, the Fort Myers Beach library was about 1 1/2 miles to the north in the direction of Fort Myers. Overall, the room for four is a little cramped with four.  Additionally, for weekly guests, the closet space is somewhat…

title: PERFECT
review: Everything and everyone at the resort made our vacation the best and most relaxing in a long time. Everything was clean and fresh. The restaurant suggestion were appreciated and everyone was right on (discounts helped).

title: excellent hotel , nothing to object, excellent location on the beach , staff always  ready , cleans rooms,Recommended 5*
review: As you discovered, Fort Myers Beach is known as a casual and relaxed destination. We are delighted to have provided you with a fantastic vacation. Thank you and we would love to have you back!  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Great Hotel on the beach.
review: Nothing to objet, great and excellent Beach hotel,everything clean , the rooms are spacious and comfortable , everything is kept in excellent condition, the pool is always clean and pleasant temperature, deck and garden surrounding the pool is in perfect condition.thank You very much!!!

title: nothing more to say!
review: I am thrilled to know that you had such a wonderful first impression of our resort. We take pride in our cleanliness and I am so glad you took notice. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Great beach location
review: We had a great room on the first floor and end unit.  It was directly on the beachfront and the balcony was above the sand level and we enjoyed sitting there enjoying the sun.  The room was very clean and well furnished and the beds were very comfortable.  The front desk staff was very helpful with restaurant suggestions near the hotel.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Great Family resort
review: This was a great place to bring the family.  Rooms where clean and pool was heated to just the right temperature.  We not only received 2 large complimentary waters at check-in ($10 charge at most other resorts), we also received a free Sandpiper beach bag!  The location is perfect with the hotel right on the water (not a half mile walk to the water like the southern end hotels).  Throw in the on-site jet-ski rentals and use of the Pink Shell resort up by the town and you can't go wrong.  Oh and don't forget the free hot coffee and ice cold water ready for you all day long near the office while you play shuffle board.  Free parking, Free WiFi, and a gas barbeque are make it the perfect family resort.

title: Get reservation request in writing....
review: I am so delighted that you found our resort to be a wonderful fit for your family vacation. Thank you for all your positive comments and your recommendations to assure future travelers that our resort is a special place on Fort Myers Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Great value for a nice resort
review: I reserved four ground level pool side rooms back in February. Later, around March or April I received a call from Pink Shell booking that a large group wanted all of our rooms and they offered to give us ocean front rooms to compensate for the change. I preferred to keep the original reservation. This was a special occasion, our triplet daughters fiftieth birthday gift for them and their family, to go back to the Sandpiper where we always went while they were growing up and we wanted the rooms we always had, pool-side ground floor for old times sake. When we arrived, three of the rooms were pool side but second story, not what I reserved. I was very disappointed and was told there was nothing in writing and the large group were already in the rooms.  We got the shaft and the…

title: Excellent!
review: I am very sorry and disappointed to hear of your experience at our resort. I understand that this was a very special trip and we could have made a better effort to honor your request. With that being said, we do not guarantee specific room requests. In most cases, we are able to meet requests, but there are those few times, depending on occupancy and availability, that we just are not able to do so. It is our mission to provide you with a memorable experience and we want nothing more than to give our guests exactly what they are requesting. I do apologize that your request was not met and I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Sandpiper Gulf Fall Break
review: Very nice and clean resort right on beach. Could walk a few steps to beach from room :) Tim  was so helpful with recommendations of restaurants and transportation options. Michelle and Mike were great, too!

title: Nice beach hotel
review: Must have been staying in a different resort from other reviewers ! Our room had not been remodelled,but was very comfortable. We had booked a courtyard room but on checking in and found out that the courtyard  view was a blank yellow wall.  The pool and garden area were very nice.  Short of towels and bathmats on several days. Reception staff okay but not really helpful. Sandpiper may be a bit complacement, but have to keep up the standards for the price they charge. There are lots of other lovely resorts on the beach.

title: Fantastic place to stay
review: We have just had 8 nights at the Sandpiper Gulf Resort. Tim checked us in and provided us with all the information needed. We were assigend a great studio on the 4th floor with a lovely view of the pool and the ocean. Studios are equipped with all the amenities that you need. Hotel has two very nice pool areas with one being reserved for adults only, which I appreciated very much. The hotel is perfectly located directly on the beach and a separate company provides chairs and umbrellas at discounted prices for the guests of Sandpiper. This was our first visit to this hotel but we have already decided to come back again next year.

title: amazing customer service
review: We arrived from Seattle yesterday. First room we were in was on the ground floor. This made me a bit uncomfortable as I love to keep the window/door open at night. Our stay was on a free certificate.. They were not obligated to change our room. BUT, Michelle made this happen. We now have a lovely room on the second floor for our week. We are now on our balcony sipping wine while our family at home is trying to stay warm in 16 degree weather...thank you Michelle and the Sandpiper staff who feel that their customers satisfaction is the most important.

title: Where relaxation and amazing sunsets were in perfect order.
review: We stayed 3 nights at the Sandpiper and I couldn't have been more pleased.  Tim checked us in quick fashion and he and Mike attended to our every need.  From their invaluable knowledge of all the best places to shop and eat to making dinner reservations for us.  We had a great room with kitchenette, an amazingly comfortable bed in a poolside room, and were just steps to the beach where we relaxed during the day and explored the shops in the afternoon and watched the amazing sunsets from the pool deck and then enjoyed great dining at the local restaurants.The staff was friendly and attentive.  I will definitely return to Fort Myers Beach and the Sandpiper!

title: Relaxing Stay at Friendly Resort.  The Sandpiper turned out to be a great place to relax, with excellent views of Gulf.
review: We chose the Sandpiper based upon the recommendation of friends, and are glad we did.  The room was the perfect size for our 10 day stay, and had all the amenities needed, including the full size refrigerator.  We truly enjoyed the ability to eat both breakfast and lunch on our balcony, which gave us a beautiful view of the Gulf. The room was clean upon arrival and kept that way throughout our stay.  This resort is close to both Publix (grocery store) and more restaurants than we had time to visit.  Most enjoyable was how close the pool was to the beach, which also provided us with great views of the Gulf while relaxing on the pool deck.

title: Very Nice, but some problems. Slightly overpriced?
review: First, the cons: our room was on the second floor overlooking the parking lot with a slight view of the beach and in our section of the building there was no elevator. Carrying two large heavy bags up the stairs was definitely not fun - if you have knee problems or a bad back, be sure to ask for the ground floor. Second, the air conditioner was NOISY and turned off and on all night every 20 minutes. I got absolutely no sleep the first night. The second night it was cool enough so that we left our patio door open and the AC off. I slept well, but my husband did not. as he said he could hear all the traffic passing by on the road right next to the hotel. Third. our TV went out completely one night right in the middle of a show that we were watching - we did not call the desk as it…

title: Beautiful sunset from balcony
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to write this detailed review. Since your last visit in 2000, we have increased our pricing and have also made many updates and renovations to our rooms. I am happy to know that your overall stay with us was a positive experience. We look forward to your return.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Fantastic Stay!
review: We were passing through Fort Myers and decided to stay for one night. Sandpiper happened to have one room available for one night. All rooms have kitchens. We were on the second floor and had a beautiful view of the Gulf and sunset from our balcony. Price was reasonable for having no reservations. Room was clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Absolute must!
review: I am very happy to read that you had a wonderful time at our resort. I am also delighted that you enjoyed the sunset view from your balcony. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Excellent
review: My Wife and I Stayed in a beautiful beach front room for our 15th wedding anniversary. The beach and ocean were just footsteps away. Having breakfast on the patio and listening to the waves and birds was great. The room was very clean and had all the amenities. Nice quiet location and resort, but still close to Publix and restaurants. We will for sure come back again!

title: Beautiful Beach
review: Situated on nice wide area of beach. Great for looking for shells and watching sunsets. Nice, quiet resort. Grounds were clean and well kept. As mentioned by others close to restaurants and Publix. Fridge, microwave, stovetop, coffee maker and toaster. Great for breakfast or reheating leftovers. Enjoyed our stay and would recommend.

title: Good Value Very Relaxing
review: Thank you for your highest recommendations! I am happy to know that you and your family had an amazing time. We look forward to your return on your next Fort Myers Beach vacation.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Great small resort!
review: 3rd visit Oct/Nov.  New décor in rooms very sharp and clean.  Resort is wonderful, walk in and relax.  Visited sister resort Pink Shell wrist bands work for beach and pool, fitness room.  Had lunch and enjoyed Sun. morning entertainment, lovely.  Sand Piper Gulf is the perfect resort to return to after going out and enjoying all that FMB has to offer.  Convenient, clean and carefree.  Enjoy !!

title: Nice quiet spot with a lovely wide beach
review: I am so happy to read of the wonderful time you had at our resort during your recent family vacation. It is our pleasure to exceed your expectations and provide a service that adds great value to your stay. We look forward to your next return.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Small
review: I had an excellent trip, small resort which made it very cozy and convenient.  Everything was only a step away including the beach.  Restaurants were close but about 20 minute walk or only minutes in the car.

title: Excelente resort para conocer la zona de Estero
review: Excellent resort to stay with the family and visit the beach estuary. Excellent front desk staff. Very good pool service and facilities for rest. We stayed 3 days during the first week of November 2014

title: Front office staff very helpful and professional! !
review: I am so happy you had a wonderful stay with your family. Thank you for your compliments of our relaxing pool and friendly associates. I am happy that you found comfort and rest during your visit. We look forward to seeing you again.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Great beach experience!
review: Tin Rybicki was very helpful each night of our stay. Very knowledgeable about the property and surrounding areas and ensured all our needs were met.  The room was clean, the heated pool was appreciated by us traveling with children.. the Staff really made our stay, really going over and above our expectations..we plan on returning in the near future.. Tim from the front desk also helped us with parking several times. Thank you!!

title: Very nice... Tim at the desk is A1
review: Thank you for your highest recommendations! I am happy to know that you had an amazing time. Thank you for mentioning Tim, I am glad to know that his customer service added to the value of your stay.  We look forward to your return on your next Fort Myers Beach vacation.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Very clean and beautiful views!
review: I had not stayed in a hotel on the beach before my recent trip to Ft. Myers Beach, FL. I was just in awe of the view when I looked out the window while checking in. The pool area was nice, not big but comfortable, and there are two pools. They have free beverage service, newspaper, games, books and sand toys, plus several gas grills for cooking out. The gulf looked so beautiful! I had an end room with a balcony that looked out over the water. How relaxing! The room had a kitchen and living room area with a pull out couch in addition to two queen beds. This hotel is about two miles or so down from the tourist area, so you have to drive there and pay to park in the tourist area. There is no parking charge for the hotel though. The front desk folks were so nice and gave us lots of…

title: Great value for a beachfront property on the South end of Estero Island.
review: Rooms appear to be recently upgraded - family and adult pools - trolley stops near the property and a killer view made for an enjoyable stay. Price is a great value.  In-room kitchenette is very modern and nicer then most beach properties. Views of sunset are breathtaking.

title: Great place to stay.Very comfortable. Great beach Great location.
review: I am so happy to read of the wonderful time you had at our resort during your recent vacation. It is our pleasure to exceed your expectations and provide a service that adds great value to your stay. We look forward to your next return.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Great get away
review: Excellent place to stay. Very nice clean rooms. Lots of amenities.Nice pools. great beach.Best place on island to stay.Close to everything but not on top of it.Would love to say there in the future. Very friendly staff.

title: We stayed in #121 with beautiful sunset views in charming botique hotel that exceeded our expectations.
review: As you discovered, Fort Myers Beach is known as a casual and relaxed destination. We are delighted to be one of the best resorts you have visited on Fort Myers Beach. Thank you, and we would love to have you back!  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Nice!
review: My husband and I stayed at this resort for a weekend getaway to celebrate our anniversary.  We stayed in an oceanfront room that had the most amazing view of the Gulf.  Having read so many reviews on Trip advisor, I knew that there was no elevator. Because I have a really bad knee, I booked directly through the hotel's website and I put in my notes that we couldn't go above the 2nd floor.  Imagine my dismay when upon arrival Michelle, the front desk clerk told us we would be staying on the 3rd floor.  I explained to her that I put in my notes when I made the reservation my request for nothing above the 2nd.  She looked into her system and stated that she didn't see any notes, however, she went to speak with the manager.  They quickly moved our reservation to the 2nd floor,…

title: Another brilliant vacation
review: We have just spent another 10 day vacation at this hotel. Excellent, friendly staff, great location.  The rooms are being renovated and ours was beautifully done, new hobs in the kitchenette, new flooring and paintwork. We will definitely be back again soon I hope!

title: Return to Sandpiper
review: Thank you for the excellent rating. I am pleased to know that you found our new renovations to be nicely done. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Bonni Davis-Delizia General Manager

title: Your own little paradise
review: My friend and I stayed at the Sandpiper many years ago and it was very nice to find the beach as beautiful as ever and the resort just as nice..Our accomodation had just been renovated so we found all very clean and pleasant. The staff tried to reassign us from the  3rd floor as we both have knee issues but were unable as the resort was booked and many rooms closed for renovation. Our only complaint was the family on the first floor partying untill 1 A.M. one night and security obviously did not inform them of quiet time starting at 10 p.m.. Also be aware that there is only one parking place per rental. We had 2 vehicles and fortunatley were able to park both because of rooms being closed.

title: This resort completely exceeded my expectations.
review: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our resort. I am sorry that we were unable to move you to a lower level room, as we do try to accommodate all requests.
